III.ii.2.H.2.b
.
Echelon for the Naval Air Force
The following list shows the echelon for the Naval Air Force:
carrier strike group                           (
CSG 5
)
carrier air wing, and                          (
CVW-2
)
squadron                                           (
VFA-2; VAQ-131
)
Notes
:
Carrier strike groups were historically designated carrier battle groups.
Carrier air wings were historically designated carrier air groups.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section H - Service Department Organizational Structures and Service Number Assignments
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section H
